name: Willa Waters
review: Great geometry provides stability; super-responsive chassis; spec is spot on; awesome fun if you are into popping and jumping down the trail

name: Gamble Bullock
review: Solid suspension; decent geometry is comfortable up, and confident down hill

name: Ana Lester
review: Supple, supportive, and smooth suspension that gives free speed; Goldilocks geometry; excellent value for money; choice part specifications

name: Mayo Donaldson
review: Great geometry provides stability; super-responsive chassis; spec is spot on; awesome fun if you are into popping and jumping down the trail

name: Cameron Green
review: Well thought-out spec; neat frame storage; looks smart; a lot of fun on the trail

name: Ashlee Harper
review: Superb handling: more regular bike than e-MTB; motor is smooth and Mission Control app adds adjustability; great, adjustable geometry; balanced, very capable suspension

name: Fleming Vance
review: The most solid suspension I have ridden in years; good value for money, with decent kit and premium-feeling frame.
